00001 #include "SNRThresholdDecider.h"

00003 // TODO: for now we check a larger mapping within an interval
00004 bool SNRThresholdDecider::checkIfAboveThreshold(Mapping* map, simtime_t start, simtime_t end)
00005 {
00006   assert(map);
00007 
00008   if(debug){
00009     debugEV << "Checking if SNR is above Threshold of " << snrThreshold << endl;
00010   }
00011 
00012   // check every entry in the mapping against threshold value
00013   ConstMappingIterator* it = map->createConstIterator(Argument(start));
00014   // check if values at start-time fulfill snrThreshold-criterion
00015   if(debug){
00016     debugEV << "SNR at time " << start << " is " << it->getValue() << endl;
00017   }
00018   if ( it->getValue() <= snrThreshold ){
00019     delete it;
00020     return false;
00021   }
00022 
00023   while ( it->hasNext() && it->getNextPosition().getTime() < end)
00024   {
00025     it->next();
00026 
00027     if(debug){
00028       debugEV << "SNR at time " << it->getPosition().getTime() << " is " << it->getValue() << endl;
00029     }
00030 
00031     // perform the check for smaller entry
00032     if ( it->getValue() <= snrThreshold) {
00033       delete it;
00034       return false;
00035     }
00036   }
00037 
00038   it->iterateTo(Argument(end));
00039   if(debug){
00040     debugEV << "SNR at time " << end << " is " << it->getValue() << endl;
00041   }
00042 
00043   if ( it->getValue() <= snrThreshold ){
00044     delete it;
00045     return false;
00046   }
00047 
00048   delete it;
00049   return true;
00050 }
00051 
00052 simtime_t SNRThresholdDecider::processSignalEnd(AirFrame* frame)
00053 {
00054   assert(frame == currentSignal.first);
00055   // here the Signal is finally processed
00056 
00057   // first collect all necessary information
00058   Mapping* snrMap = calculateSnrMapping(frame);
00059   assert(snrMap);
00060 
00061   //TODO: this extraction is just temporary, since we need to pass Signal's start-
00062   // and end-time to the following method
00063   const Signal& signal = frame->getSignal();
00064   simtime_t start = signal.getSignalStart();
00065   simtime_t end = start + signal.getSignalLength();
00066 
00067   bool aboveThreshold = checkIfAboveThreshold(snrMap, start, end);
00068 
00069   // check if the snrMapping is above the Decider's specific threshold,
00070   // i.e. the Decider has received it correctly
00071   if (aboveThreshold)
00072   {
00073     debugEV << "SNR is above threshold("<<snrThreshold<<") -> sending up." << endl;
00074     // go on with processing this AirFrame, send it to the Mac-Layer
00075     phy->sendUp(frame, new DeciderResult(true));
00076   } else
00077   {
00078     debugEV << "SNR is below threshold("<<snrThreshold<<") -> dropped." << endl;
00079   }
00080 
00081   delete snrMap;
00082   snrMap = 0;
00083 
00084 
00085   // we have processed this AirFrame and we prepare to receive the next one
00086   currentSignal.first = 0;
00087 
00088   //channel turned idle
00089   setChannelIdleStatus(true);
00090 
00091   return notAgain;
00092 }
